titles.title: Small Business Enhancement Act of 1996
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount which may be expensed with respect to certain depreciable business assets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/25/1996--Introduced. Small Business Enhancement Act of 1996 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the dollar limitation on the cost of property which may be expensed by businesses as depreciable assets.
